sect2.title: Installation of libpng
sect2.para: Install libpng by running the following commands:

userinput.command: patch -Np1 -i libpng-1.2.5-link-to-proper-libs.patch && make prefix=/usr \ ZLIBINC=/usr/include ZLIBLIB=/usr/lib -f scripts/makefile.linux && make prefix=/usr install -f scripts/makefile.linux
